spring: application: name: admin_service docker: compose: enabled: false datasource: url: jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/admin_service?createDatabaseIfNotExist=true&useUnicode=yes&characterEncoding=UTF-8 username: kumuditha password: kumuditha1234 driver-class-name: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver jpa: hibernate: ddl-auto: update show-sql: true properties: hibernate: dialect: org.hibernate.dialect.MySQLDialect format_sql: true
